text: Jwalakwe jwatite: “Nganiiwa im’bichilile wanganyammwe yakulya kuwa lisiki lyenu, ikaweje chimbe ndili nantagulile ngopolelo syakwe nkaniim’bichilile. Ayi niyine mu yanjiganyisye Ambuje wangu (Allah). Chisimu une nesile dini jawandu wangakukulupilila mwa Allah, soni wanganyao ya Akhera akuwa ali nkuikana.”
